*Aakanksha Ohri*

Hi,

Pls see the logo, reference images and screenshots in this drive : https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/19jgSJxd384aFPZBc6RlGzY8NDnD4Ff1J?usp=drive_link

On Thu, Aug 7, 2025 at 1:06 PM Design Team <support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:
Dear Aakanksha Ohri,

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/26600

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
Design Team _ Brand Marketing Support Team

body_text: Hi Aakanksha Ohri,  Sharing three options for the DQR screen: Option 01 is as per the space provided by the brand, while Options 02 and 03 are our suggestions based on NPCI guidelines.     Please share Brand and Marketing approval with us.     Thanks  Rakesh
body:
Hi Aakanksha Ohri,

Sharing three options for the DQR screen: Option 01 is as per the space provided by the brand, while Options 02 and 03 are our suggestions based on NPCI guidelines.

Please share Brand and Marketing approval with us.

Thanks
Rakesh
